com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views

Class EntityListViewFactory<V extends ViewCreationContext>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.SimpleEntityViewFactorySupport<V,T>
      • com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.ConfigurablePropertiesEntityViewFactorySupport<V,EntityListView>
        • com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.EntityListViewFactory<V>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EntityViewFactory<V>

    public class EntityListViewFactory<V extends ViewCreationContext>
extends ConfigurablePropertiesEntityViewFactorySupport<V,EntityListView>
    Handles a list of items (entities) with support for the properties to show, paging, sorting and configuring the sortable properties.
    Author:
    Arne Vandamme
